name: Gentle Breeze Hot Air Balloon Company, Ltd
about: Gentle Breeze Hot Air Balloon Company, Ltd, with over 40 years of experience in hot air ballooning, is Ohioâ€™s foremost provider of hot air balloon rides and flight training. Based near Dayton and Cincinnati, we have been operating continuously since 1980. Our chief pilot, Brian, has 37 years of flying experience and is an FAA-appointed Designated Pilot Examiner. We offer safe, scenic flights over suburban areas, along with comprehensive flight training under FAA Part 61 classification. Our services include certified hot air balloon maintenance and mechanics. Safety is our primary objective, and we provide an educational and enjoyable experience, complete with a traditional champagne toast after each flight. Join us for a once-in-a-lifetime hot air balloon experience.
